snippet.title: Geelong Cats skipper Joel Selwood out until AFL finals
snippet.content: Geelong have been dealt a huge injury blow with Joel Selwood to undergo surgery which will sideline him until the AFL finals. The Cats skipper will have surgery on his left ankle after suffering a syndesmosis injury during Friday night's loss to Sydney.Photo: AAP "Selwood will not be available for the remaining three home and away games but is expected to be able to return for the finals series," the Cats said in a statement on Sunday. AAP, more to come
